code: import{createSchema,addTranslations,setLanguageByName}from'react-hook-form-auto';import'../../Utils/Constants';var handleChange=function handleChange(value,_ref){var setValue=_ref.setValue;if(global.Constants.CARACTERES_ESPECIALES.formatOnlyLetters.test(value)){setValue('nombre',value);}else{setValue('nombre',value.substring(0,value.length-1));}};export var DepartamentoModel=createSchema('DepartamentoModel',{nombre:{type:'string',required:true,minLength:3,maxLength:255,onChange:handleChange},codigo_dane:{type:'number',required:true,maxLength:255,helperText:'C贸digo DANE del departamento'},estado:{type:'select',required:true,options:[{value:'1',label:'Activo'},{value:'0',label:'Inactivo'}]}});setLanguageByName('es');addTranslations({models:{DepartamentoModel:{nombre:'Nombre ',codigo_dane:'C贸digo Dane',estado:'Estado'}}});
